markdownRemark.html: Situated inside the modern Islantilla residential complex, the resort is one of the best and most well-known golf courses on Spain's western coast. It has 27 holes, three different courses surrounded by leafy vegetation and impressive sea-views. The hotel is popular with families due to its excellent facilities that includes a Beach Club.

frontmatter.title: Islantilla Golf Resort
